Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 76th/Greenwood
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via Greenwood, 75th, South Chicago, 76th and Stony Island due to street blockage near 76th/Greenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Greenwood, 75th, South Chicago, 76th and Stony Island due to street blockage near 76th/Greenwood.

Allow extra travel time.
